field.name: comp
field.label: Component
field.description: select which xbCulture component to get items from

field.name: itemcnt
field.label: Items to list
field.description: How many items from selected component to show in the module.

field.name: pretext
field.label: Text before
field.description: Optional text to display above times

field.name: display
field.label: Display type
field.description: Image will automatically only select items with an image, click on image will link to item page, optional tooltip on mouseover image set below

field.name: cols
field.label: Images per row
field.description: How many images to show in each row in the module width

field.name: showdate
field.label: Show Date
field.description: Show first/last/year date depending on sort order. If rating is shown then review date will always be shown.

field.name: reviewed
field.label: All or Rated only
field.description: only include rated items and use review date for order, or include all items and use catalogued date for order.

field.name: fiction
field.label: Fiction/non-Fiction
field.description: Select fiction only, non-fiction only or both.

field.name: filter
field.label: Filter by
field.description: filter type to select items

field.name: tagfilt
field.label: Tag(s)
field.description: Select tags to filter by, multiple tags can select either items with all or anyy of the tags

field.name: taglogic
field.label: Multi Tag Logic
field.description: If multiple tags are selected can require all, or any, or none of the selected tags to be present

field.name: ratfilt
field.label: Rating
field.description: Only show items with selected rating. If more items are returned than your max item count above then a random selection will be shown which should refresh every time a page is loaded/reloaded

field.name: bperfilt
field.label: Person
field.description: Show only books linked to a particular person
field.option: Start to type first or last name

field.name: brole
field.label: Role in Book
field.description: Filter by specific role

field.name: fperfilt
field.label: Person
field.description: Show only films linked to a particular person
field.option: Start to type first or last name

field.name: frole
field.label: Role in Film
field.description: Filter by specific role

field.name: tiptype
field.label: Tooltip type
field.description: Whether to display tooltip as just the title, larger image and title, or not at all

field.name: tipwid
field.label: Width for image tooltip
field.description: Set width in pixels for the image in the tooltip to suit your module position. NB smaller images will be expanded to fit and may look blurred

field.name: tippos
field.label: Tooltip Position
field.description: If module position is on left choose 'right', if on right choose 'left'

field.name: sortby
field.label: Sort list
field.description: Order to present the list in

field.name: sortdir
field.label: Sort direction
field.description: Ascending means A or earliest date or lowest rating will be at top. Descending is the opposite. If items have the same date or rating then title will be used (ascending) as a secondary sort.

field.name: posttext
field.label: Text after
field.description: Text to display below times
